title: Watson event discusses increasing student debt, private finance's control of universities - The Brown Daily Herald
content: Watson event discusses increasing student debt, private finance's control of universities  The Brown Daily Herald
description: The expanding impact of finance on American universities was discussed at a Tuesday evening virtual talk hosted by the Watson Institute. The event focused on a new book entitled “Bankers in the Ivory Tower: The Troubling Rise of Financiers in US Higher Education” by Charlie Eaton, assistant professor of sociology at University of California, Merced.
